text: Salford City are a club based in Salford. Salford is a major English City. They currently play in League 2 The 4th Division of English Football. Salford City are currently owned by many people such as David Beckham, Gary Neville, Phill Neville, and Ryan Giggs. Category:Salford Category:Football clubs in Greater Manchester
title: Salford City F.C.
